title: Who wrote famous SNL sketches? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s impossible to answer that without knowing what sketches you have in mind. SNL has employed hundreds of writers over its 45-year history (and cast members are expected to at least contribute in the writing process), so the writer of a sketch you loved in 1978 would not have been the same one who wrote a great sketch last season. List of Saturday Night Live writers - Wikipedia
One of my favorite SNL sketches was written by Tina Fey. The Colonel “Angus “ sketch  I love this sketch.
